Dutch[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • audio
    		(file)
  • IPA(key): /ɣəˈboːrə(n)/
  • Rhymes: -oːrən

Adjective[edit]

geboren (not comparable)

  1. born

Inflection[edit]

Inflection of geboren
uninflectedgeboren
inflectedgeboren
comparative—
positive
predicative/adverbialgeboren
indefinitem./f. sing.geboren
n. sing.geboren
pluralgeboren
definitegeboren
partitivegeborens

Participle[edit]

geboren

  1. past participle of baren (“give birth”); born
    Ik ben geboren in 1977.
    I was born in 1977.

German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ɡəˈboːrən/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Participle[edit]

geboren

  1. past participle of gebären
